text: Dean Paul is an American football coach. He is the head football coach at Ohio Northern University in Ada, Ohio, a position he has held since 2004. Paul served in the same capacity at Thomas More College in Crestview Hills, Kentucky from 1999 to 2003. A native of Garrettsville, Ohio, he played college football as a running back at Mount Union College—now known as the University of Mount Union—from 1987 to 1990. ==Head coaching record== ==References== ==External links== * Ohio Northern profile Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Allegheny Gators football coaches Category:Fordham Rams football coaches Category:Mount Union Purple Raiders football players Category:Ohio Northern Polar Bears football coaches Category:Thomas More Saints football coaches Category:Tulane Green Wave football coaches Category:Wooster Fighting Scots football coaches Category:People from Garrettsville, Ohio
title: Dean Paul
